casebody.data:
First Department,

Mat, 1953.

(May 4,1953.) The People of the State of New York ex rel. George Brussel, Jr., against Helene B. Brussel.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. Motion for reargument granted and, upon reargument, the order of this court is modified only to allow the children to continue at the Flushing school for the remainder of the present school term. The motion is in all other respects denied and the previous determination of the court adhered to. Settle order on notice. Present — Peck, P. J., Callahan, Van Voorhis and Breitel, JJ. [See ante, p. 247.]
